H0.text: What is the name of the plastic bit on the end of shoelaces. Tiplet

H1.text: What is the name of the plastic bit on the end of shoelaces. Lacecap

H2.text: What is the name of the plastic bit on the end of shoelaces. Cordstop

H3.text: What is the name of the plastic bit on the end of shoelaces. Agnet

A4.text: An aglet ( AG-l…ôt) or aiglet is a small sheath, often made of plastic or metal, attached at each end of a shoelace, a cord, or a drawstring.

A5.text: The machines wrap plastic tape around the end of new shoelaces and use heat or chemicals to melt the plastic onto the shoelace and bond the plastic to itself.
